biotools.summary: The Tool performs a quality assessment of a dataset based on a series of requirements that are set specifically for each use case. The tool informs the user of corrective actions that need to be taken prior to the data provision to ensure that the data provided is of high quality and reports a series of quality metrics characterizing the specific dataset.

bioschemas.name: Data Integration Quality Check Tool (DIQCT)
